metadata.synopsis: One liner for Gondian Worker04, Manser Biggs, after the player has visited the Iron Throne and has begun to liberate the gnomes in the Steel Foundry.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen debug bookSet flag for haivng saved prisonersGo to -1937; 0; 443Kill enemeisdisarm all kill switches that join combatClick on Old Mich'Lichen

0.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
0.text: Don't waste your time on me - keep going.
0.context: NodeContext: trying to keep it together, and failing

1.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
1.text: Gond's bollocks, I thought I was dead. Hoped I was, to be honest.
1.context: NodeContext: shaken up, thinking of his dead husband, can't believe he's alive and lanpos isn't

4.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
4.text: Why don't you go help the others? I'll rest up here.

2.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
2.text: Blow this place to the Nine Hells - you hear me?

3.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
3.text: Toobin said you were on the way - glad to see the old man is still as crafty as ever. Keep going - we've got your back.
